text: @realDonaldTrump You finally admit we have a  DEADLY pandemic. Now the WH don’t have equipment for doctors to attend to those in need of treatment. NO MASKS, NO PROTECTIVE  GEAR FOR DOCTORS, NO TESTS TO KNOW WHO IS CARRYING the VIRUS ....SAD SAD SAD!
